title: Werebird

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, learn who visits your target
- During a New Moon, learn what happens to your target

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Investigation results are shared with other Weres.
- You cannot target other Weres:

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**From The Skies Above**
You will also learn what happens to your taget's neighbors. In addition, Learn who your target visits.

desc:
Post 532
*Tweet tweet, son of a gun.*
